channel.title: How to make openvswitch work?
channel.description: Hi, I need to make openvswitch to work on Kicksecure! After I bridge my NIC I can't connect to internet anymore. I can't ping anything on the same subnet. I executed `arp` command and it founds every other machine on the same subnet but the hwaddress(mac address of other machine on the subnet boardcast) are showing "(incomeplete)". Please help me!

item.title: How to make openvswitch work?
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
Hi, I need to make openvswitch to work on Kicksecure! After I bridge my NIC I can’t connect to internet anymore. I can’t ping anything on the same subnet. I executed arp command and it founds every other machine on the same subnet but the hwaddress(mac address of other machine on the subnet boardcast) are showing “(incomeplete)”. Please help me!

Read full topic
